item.title: Report X-2025040405
item.description:
Report X-2025040405

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-29
  • City: GAITHERSBURG
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED ON THE RADIO AND WAS INFORMED THAT THERE WAS A LEAKING HAZMAT ON THE RED BELT. RESPONDER OBSERVED THAT IT WAS A FLAMMABLE LIQUID HAZMAT. THEN TOOK THE HAZMAT BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROCESSING.
